programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List EP6
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: Cheongdam International High School 2 Ep1

programme.title: Confession Ep13

programme.desc: After a heart transplant saved Do-hyun's life, his father was convicted of murder and sentenced to death. To prove his innocence, Do-hyun becomes a lawyer and investigates the case.

programme.title: The Boy

programme.title: The Bay Of Silence
programme.desc: Will believes his wife Rosalind is innocent of their son's suspected murder, only to discover the devastating truth behind her past links her to another unsolved crime.

programme.title: My Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Undercover cop enlists his childhood friends to travel to Japan to help him catch a Yakuza group.

programme.title: Security

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China

programme.title: The Closet

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: Acts Of Violence

programme.title: Exit

programme.title: Den Of Thieves
programme.desc: An elite unit of LA County Sheriff's Department have to stop a notorious crew of expert thieves from robbing the impenetrable Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive and Mary-Ann investigate 34,000 years of Britain’s Gods and Monsters. The intrepid duo hunt for King Arthur, uncover the gates of hell, and decipher some very rude ancient graffiti in search of answers to Britain’s most mystic mysteries.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how ad campaigns from the '50s launched new American traditions and the promise of a bright tomorrow.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: Examine '60s ad men and women and how they used wit and irony to reach a new audience, consequently revolutionizing the industry.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson joins the US Marines' 'Heavy Haulers' squadron as they're put to the test. They battle to keep their fleet of CH53 'Super Stallion' choppers flying, in preparation for intense warfare training exercises in the desert and mountains.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes on a cross-country road trip to help the Well Done Foundation. They work to find and cap some of the estimated two million leaking, toxic - potentially deadly abandoned oil and gas wells that are scattered throughout the U.S.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip teaches Oh her version of kung fu so he can stand up to a bully/Oh finds a real wolf to teach him how to become a werewolf for Halloween.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Shelby, Peabody & Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show; Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: With Snotlout’s fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Dragon Quest The unlucky staff of a medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown, get an unfriendly visit from Professor Thurdigree Burns. Opposite Day When Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry, everyone but Casper turns into his or her opposite.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to launch an investigation. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Iron Ball

Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: 100 years ago, shipping packages was slow, and shipping overnight was impossible, until two Seattle brothers risk everything to reinvent shipping packages for all.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: We explore some of the most valuable treasures found in the most unlikely of ways. Like an Ancient Roman mosaic hiding in an apartment, or a valuable piece of Americana tucked away in a flea market.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Jordan Jonas (Season 6 winner) challenges three expert builders, Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Callie North (Season 3), and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5) to build a raft with a shelter.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Joel van der Loon (Season 7) built some unique projects during their time on Alone.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: One of WWII greatest unsolved mysteries: an incomparable work of art is lost without a trace. Perhaps the single most valuable object the Nazis ever stole, the quest for it has lasted over 75 years.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Rick and Chum show off their pearly whites when a seller brings in a pair of Tyrannosaurus teeth. Will they be chomping at the bit? Then, Corey goes to bat for a signed Mark Buehrle jersey.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In the final of the Gladiators of the Forge episodes, it's back to the Colosseum for the last two one-on-one battles. The champion has defeated six opponents, but now must face a returning challenger.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: For thousands of years, Scotland has been an epicentre of otherworldly phenomena. It is home to strange ancient stone circles, stories of strange beings. Is Scotland a magnet for extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For centuries, humanity has been fixated on Mars - the glowing red orb in the night sky. As a new era of exploration of the Red Planet begins, we are on the cusp of finally solving its mysteries.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Mankind has always pondered what happens after death and what we leave behind. Many wonder what power our bones may hold. Some believe bones can bring good luck or even allow us to speak with the dead.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Hungarian professor, Erno Rubik, ignites "Cube Mania" with his 3D puzzle that takes the world by storm. Leslie Scott will stop at nothing to bring an iconic building block board game to market.

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: Follows the American Mafia from their early development in New York City through Prohibition to the boom days of the 1950s. It explores the families' operations and their alleged code of honour.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The gates are open to some of history's most sinister structures. From the terrifying Tower of London to a hotel of horrors, discover the dark secrets hidden within these foreboding fortresses.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: A woman in charge of staff lunches at a Tokyo design company cooks in the morning and works as an assistant designer in the afternoon. Tune in and check out the amazing lunches she cooks up.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Maksym Haichenko has created a free Japanese language learning app for fellow Ukrainian evacuees at the Japanese IT company where he works. He talks about the development process.

programme.title: Hit the Road Chiba
programme.desc: Let's drive through Chiba Prefecture! We depart from Tokyo Station and enjoy magic hour at scenic Byobugaura. Along the way, encounter Chiba's traditions and be amazed by their artistic quality.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Izumi no Kami Kanesada, the much-loved sword of Hijikata Toshizo, the "Shogun's last samurai."

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Edo Aquatics
programme.desc: We go out onto a river where pleasure seekers take in an aquatics show. At first glance a display of rag-tag theatricality, the perform-ers are actually practicing a centuries-old form of swimming.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: An improper diagnosis in early childhood led Shibasaki Akane to spend nearly half her life in a world without words. We follow her as she expands her horizons and moves toward an independent future.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Scholar Minakata Kumagusu made contributions to biology, folklore, and other fields. He laid the foundation for environmental conservation in Japan. We explore the environments that inspired his work.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: After 42 years, JR West's Limited Express Yakumo has been renewed, boldly redesigned inside and out, with improvements made to the comfort and ride quality. Join us as we feature the new Yakumo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Horses take center stage in the ancient capital's events, such as two May festivals--Aoi Matsuri boasting ornate historical attire and the 1,200-year-old Fujinomori-sai.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land to see the ducks in the river.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad and they want to use it and snaffle it one after another. Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot. Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: It’s the annual Mayor’s Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet. Ryder comes across a map for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. During Cap’n Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: A mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus. Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop. There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall and Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix it.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,”and bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Mom's TV interview.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isn't fish.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Hank goes on a swashbuckling adventure to help Captain Bubblebeard recover his signature beard. William becomes moody and distant during an epic sleepover.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Chucks and Ezra set out to find a special song.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport. After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it. Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. When Barbabeau lacks inspiration and can't create anymore, the family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Smallville S1 2
programme.desc: Clark learns a fellow student has been attacked by Kryptonite-affected bugs and has taken on the life cycle of an insect -- with Lana as his prey.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 9
programme.desc: The new couple (aka the "younger, trendier Brandon and Lori") are back. Will it be "Out with the old, in with the new?"

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 10
programme.desc: Papa Bear sees a clue in a bin that leads him to believe there's a shotgun hidden in it. Lori teams up with Jesse behind Brandon's back to win the big specialty item at the end of the day. Brandon's anger turns to joy once it's revealed to be an antique fire engine.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Arrow S2 3
programme.desc: When medicine for Glades Memorial Hospital is being hijacked by thieves, Oliver gets into a heated battle with China White and her new partner, the Bronze Tiger, over the supplies.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 13
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin reveal the ultimate hands-free mower and find hacks for removing carpet stains. Plus, they'll hack a chandelier and learn from pros with Becky's Beauty Hacks and Broke Ass Bob's guide to owning a dog.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr take to the court to serve up some seriously personal tennis lessons, and then head to the park for a bewildering game of Now! And tonight's loser must put his face through the ultimate test during a food presentation!

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 9
programme.desc: The fiercest competitors from season 1 return to claim Dodgeball supremacy above all the rest.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 11
programme.desc: At an auction set in wine and horse country, Jesse and David, aka the Leprechaun, spar over bins they hope will have wine in them. Brandon and Lori win a beautiful pristine horse trailer; but the real treasure turns out to be what's inside - a hot air balloon!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 12
programme.desc: Jesse wins a bin that turns out to include a giant pad for stuntmen to land on when they jump out of tall buildings. Meanwhile, Papa Bear wins a vintage 1970's British sportscar -but he can't fit into it!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks - Episode 5

programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: Diabolo Menthe
programme.desc: Paris, 1963. It's back to school for 13-year-old Anne and her sister Frederique, who is 15. In their all-girls secondary school, the teaching method remains very strict. In spite of the rules, Frederique is interested in boys and politics. Anne, for the moment, lives in her sister's shadow.

programme.title: Sur La Touche
programme.desc: Amra recently left her family to start her professional footballing career. But one weekend, she decides to go home out of worry for her grandparents' health.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: Professor Didier Pittet spreads his wings and takes on life as a crow. Whether it's being a stool pigeon, a bird brain or a featherbrain: birds have the reputation of not being very bright. But all the scientific research shows quite the opposite, they are in fact formidably intelligent.

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: At the heart of the Philadelphia Museum of Art hang works by leading impressionist painters, such as Manet, Degas, Sisley, Monet, Morisot, Renoir and Pissarro.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Meuh, L'epopee Des Cornes
programme.desc: Domesticated 10,500 years ago in Mesopotamia, the wild auroch has since vanished from the surface of the Earth. Its descendents, oxen, cows and bulls, continue to keep company with mankind on all five continents. Turkey, Portugal, USA, France: from Neolithic times to the modern-day, we head off to meet them.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Ma Ville Aux Rayons X
programme.desc: A space conducive to concentration is essential. Above all for the 1.3 million Canadians who suffer from ADHD (attention deficit hyperactivity disorder). In Beauport, Olivier meets up with Joanie and makes the most of the opportunity to find out more about the condition with ADHD specialists.

programme.title: Mon Village a L'Heure Du Tour
programme.desc: evaux-les-Bains in the Creuse, 10 July 2024. For the first time this little town, population 1,300, will host a sporting event of global renown: the Tour de France. The mayor and his team spend a year finalising the flamboyant preparations for this 11th stage. An immersive visit behind the scenes.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: L'epicerie
programme.desc: Associated with better physical or mental performance, energy drinks can have harmful effects on health. Also: the hidden side of natural flavors; the hand mixer test; discovering kulfi and bouza ice creams.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ma Ville Aux Rayons X
programme.desc: A space conducive to concentration is essential. Above all for the 1.3 million Canadians who suffer from ADHD (attention deficit hyperactivity disorder). In Beauport, Olivier meets up with Joanie and makes the most of the opportunity to find out more about the condition with ADHD specialists.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobie lands on the Prairie and meets the inhabitants of the Grasslands, the Pelees, who used to frighten him so much. Weak and lost, he is taken in by these unknown people.

programme.title: L'epicerie
programme.desc: Associated with better physical or mental performance, energy drinks can have harmful effects on health. Also: the hidden side of natural flavors; the hand mixer test; discovering kulfi and bouza ice creams.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: He is best known as the owner of FC Sion, company director and French-speaking Swiss media star. Christian Constantin is boss and he likes it. Inviting him to play the role of a simple worker bee who works for the good of the hive was a challenge. Which he accepted.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Sur La Dalle
programme.desc: Adamsberg and Mathieu are sure: a serial killer is on the loose. They need to identify his motive to catch him before he can do any more harm. The key to the enigma is closely linked to regional folklore. Lying on a dolmen, Adamsberg uses his imagination to find the solution.

programme.title: Le Spectacle De La Fete Du Canada
programme.desc: Several thousand people are expected to gather at LeBreton Flats Park in Ottawa on July 1 to celebrate Canada Day. To mark Canada's 158th birthday, a host of artists are coming together for a major concert.

programme.title: L'impresario De Smyrne
programme.desc: After a series of exhausting tours, opera singers arrive in Venice for the carnival. When rivalries erupt into the open, a pseudo-impresario announces that a wealthy Turkish merchant is planning to take on the best singers in the town to form an opera.

programme.title: Brillantes
programme.desc: Karine, works nights as a cleaner and is a single mother to 17 year-old Ziggy. The day her company is taken over, her life turns upside down. Social pressure forces her into a corner, threatening her with an impossible choice: reveal a secret or lie to protect herself?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 28
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 43
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 7
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 12
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 28

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 4
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Brush ep 1
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 3
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kakampi Ko ang Diyos
programme.desc: Using a religious stature to defend himself, an ex-soldier and intelligence agent gets trapped in a conspiracy involving government and rebel forces.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 7
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?
